page.title: 14EDUCATION STOKE ON TERN
page.content: {SPORTS DAY On Sports Day four different House Teams have races against each other. The school is divided into the House colours red, yellow, green and blue. There is a mixture of races: bean bag, flat, sack, skipping, leap frog and obstacle.Points are awarded to the winners and at the end they are added up and the winning team is presented with a silver Cup. {FAMILY PICNIC } This is when we have one enormous picnic with our families out on the school playing fields. The Dinner Ladies make all the food for us. After our outdoor lunch the families are entertained by the children who play fun games.The field is set up with lots of activities. We have to clamber over bales of straw, carry buckets of water to fill up barrels- it's great!
